snippet: Senator Jim DeMint, a Republican from South Carolina, will lead the Heritage Foundation: a platform and a payday that the United States Senate could never provide him.
abstract: Conservative Republican Sen Jim DeMint of South Carolina, who helped ignite Tea Party movement, is leaving Senate to become president of conservative research group Heritage Foundation; resignation comes during time when many Republicans blame him for party's failure to win Senate control and as Tea Party followers in Congress face new pressure to pull back from their uncompromising views in election’s aftermath.
lead_paragraph: Senator Jim DeMint, a Republican from South Carolina, will lead the Heritage Foundation: a platform and a payday that the United States Senate could never provide him.

headline.seo: DeMint, Tea Party Hero, Leaving Senate
headline.main: Tea Party Hero Is Leaving the Senate for a New Pulpit
headline.print_headline: Tea Party Hero Leaving Senate For New Pulpit
